name: npm-hosted
content:
import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy
def name='npm-hosted'
if(!repository.getRepositoryManager().exists(name)) { repository.createNpmHosted(name, BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, true, WritePolicy.ALLOW_ONCE) }
